name: Simple 1500 Jitsuyou Series Vol. 14: Kurashi no Manner: Kankonsousai Hen
overview: Simple 1500 Jitsuyou Series Vol.14 - Kurashi no Manners - Kankonsousai Hen is the 14th game in the practical 1500 series released for the Playstation One console by D3 Publisher. This time the game let the user to know the proper etiquette manners for special events like weddings or funerals, etc. The game also features a quiz mode to let the player knows if he learned the lessons well.
